title: Homemade garlic bread
description: This is superior garlic bread. The garlic is roasted until caramelised and then pressed into homemade bread dough before baking. Serve toasted with mozzarella and with a simple coriander and tomato salad.
ingredients: 250g/9oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
30ml/1fl oz olive oil, plus extra for oiling
